what: A repository of spatial data for center pivot sprinklers across South Carolina
title: Spatial data for center pivot irrigation systems in South Carolina
text: sccenterpivot open-source R-package published repository GitHub. package stores spatial data representing (, nearly ) center pivot sprinklers South Carolina 2009 2022. data result multiple research studies (Pellett 2020, Sekaran Payero 2023, Pellett 2024), applied several studies (Zurqani et al 2021, Pellett 2024 Appendix ), including water availability planning coastal plain South Carolina (documented Pee Dee River Basin Plan, published SC Department Environmental Services). website documents sccenterpivot R-package provides access data general public without requiring use R software. package developed Dr. Charles Alex Pellett, studying Clemson University working South Carolina Department Natural Resources (SC DNR). information intended research long-term water planning. None guarantees accuracy, reliability, completeness information. SC DNR Dr. Pellett liable loss damage arising use information.

what: Opportunities for New Center Pivot Installations — opportunities
title: Opportunities for New Center Pivot Installations — opportunities
text: Opportunities new center pivot installations identified based absence constraints slopes>5%, wetlands, conservation areas, projected future impervious surfaces, open water. Available "unconstrained" areas sufficient size shape ranked according distance existing irrigated areas area cultivated land overlaid irrigation opportunity polygon.

text: Irrigation zones spatial polygons overlaying irrigated areas.

title: Irrigation Zones — zones
text: sf dataframe following columns: id_a unique ID polygon, integer. Type Center Pivot, center pivot, sprinklers year2009 - year2021 Columns years observations made (2009, 2011, 2013, 2015, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2021). 1=irrigation observed, 0=irrigation observed. Acres Polygon acreage County county South Carolina polygon located geometry list-column geometries (polygons)
